vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ἔκπᾰλαι,
adverb for ἐκ πάλαι, for a long time, [NT+1st c.AD+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: for a long time, long ago
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
for a long time, long ago
of old, long since, 2Pet. 2:3; 3:5*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: adv. por mucho tiempo, hace tiempo
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 很久以前 (彼後 3:5)
2) 長久以來 (彼後 2:3)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 很久以前 (彼后 3:5)
2) 长久以来 (彼后 2:3)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: từ lâu rồi; từ lâu nay. ἐκ (G1537) + πάλαι (G3819)
